column2: #I create a list for all possible combinations
append(., combn(1:5, 3) %>% split(., rep(1:ncol(.), each = nrow(.)))) %>%
append(., combn(1:5, 2) %>% split(., rep(1:ncol(.), each = nrow(.)))) %>%
append(., combn(1:5, 5) %>% split(., rep(1:ncol(.), each = nrow(.)))) %>%
